content: The Deathstinger Soak can be found upon defeating the Scorpion Prince enemy in The Verdure Bridge area of The Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Deathstinger_(Soak).md', within the main section titled 'Deathstinger (Soak)', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Deathstinger (Soak) Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Deathstinger Soak can be found upon defeating the Scorpion Prince enemy in The Verdure Bridge area of The Webbed Hollow.
